flawed_nl_solution:
There are 6500 kg - 150 kg = <<6500-150=3650>>3650 kg of sellable potatoes.
These will fit into 3650 kg / 50 kg/bag = <<3650/50=73>>73 bags
In total, these will be sold for 73 bags * $72/bag = $<<73*72=5256>>5256
#### 5256

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6350, not 3650. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
